input: Morning fog covered the harbor. Boats sounded their horns. Fishermen whispered as they checked their nets. The fog lifted slowly, revealing a bright blue sky.

output.surface: Morning fog covered the harbor. Boats sounded their horns. Fishermen whispered as they checked their nets. The fog lifted slowly, revealing a bright blue sky.
